title: The Secret Taj
description: A once in a lifetime trip to India leads to a once in a lifetime love.Chaperoning the teenage winner of a trip to Delhi was not high on Joanna Hamilton’s list of desired job tasks. Nevertheless, she devotes herself to the onerous duty of escorting the rebellious teen through Northern India. Her task is made even more difficult by the documentary crew filming the journey—especially dealing with the autocratic director Matthew Howard.Yet as they travel through the breathtaking landscapes of India, Joanna finds herself falling for the proud man, that is, until she is informed that their relationship could jeopardize all that he has worked for. Amongst the beauty of the Taj Mahal, Joanna must decide whether she should let him go, or fight for their blossoming love.This Retro Romance reprint was originally published in 1984 by Robert Hale Ltd.
author: Stella Whitelaw
